name: My Little Candy Store
description:
My Little Candy Store

Oh no!

The shop is about to open, but the front window display is EMPTY!
Use stuff from the backroom and, of course, CANDY to make the bestest most atrractivest display!

MAKE IT POP!

Game made in 2-3 days for the Bubblegum Jam, and to familiarize myself with Unity, all feedbacks are welcome <3

Happy tunes from M0nPlaisir's POSITIVE ATTITUDE! album: https://chezmonplaisir.bandcamp.com/album/positive-attitude

How To Play:

Use the arrow keys or usual WASD (qwerty) keys to move around, click when the pointer is on an item you want to pick up. Click again to let it fall.
Finish the game by clicking on the OPEN? sign :)
(or hit the escape key, it's up to you, you'll only miss the decoration highscore)

Enjoy yourselves!
